src:
Nyu-Yorkda UFC 244 kechasi bo‘lib o‘tdi. Asosiy jangda Nayt Dias mag‘lubiyatga uchradi

03 Nov 2019, 14:15

Toshkent vaqti bilan 3-noyabr tongida AQShning Nyu York shahrida UFC 244 musobaqasi bo‘lib o‘tdi.


Foto: Twitter/@UFC

Kechaning asosiy jangida Nayt Dias va Xorxe Masvidal BMF kamari uchun bahs olib bordi. Jang uchinchi va to‘rtinchi raundlar oralig‘ida to‘xtatildi. Shifokorlar Diasni tekshiruvdan o‘tkazdi va unga jangni davom ettirishga ruxsat bermadi. Shu tariqa Masvidal texnik nokaut bilan g‘alabaga erishdi.
Asosiy kardagi boshqa janglar natijasi bilan tanishing:
Darren Till (18-2-1) Kelvin Gastelumni (15-5) ochkolar hisobi bo‘yicha mag‘lub etdi (27-30, 29-28, 30-27), o‘rta vazn;
Stiven Tompson (15-4-1) Visente Lyukeni (17-7-1) ochkolar hisobi bo‘yicha mag‘lub etdi (30-26, 30-26, 29-27), yarimo‘rta vazn;
Derrik Lyuis (22-7) Blagoy Ivanovni (18-3) ochkolar hisobi bo‘yicha mag‘lub etdi (30-27, 28-29, 29-28), og‘ir vazn;
Kevin Li (18-5) Gregor Gillespini (13-1) birinchi raundda nokautga uchratdi, yengil vazn.







Yanada ko‘proq futbol va sport yangiliklaridan boxabar bo‘lishni istasangiz, “Daryo”ning Telegram’dagi rasmiy sport kanali — @daryo_sport’ga obuna bo‘ling!
text:
UFC 244 Night in New York. Knight was defeated in the main battle

03 Nov 2019, 14:15

The UFC 244 tournament was held in New York, USA, on November 3 at 10:00 am Tashkent time.


Photo: Twitter / @ UFC

In the main battle of the night, Nate Dias and Jorge Masvidal competed for the BMF belt. The fight was interrupted between the third and fourth rounds. The doctors examined Dias and did not allow him to continue the fight. Thus, Masvidal won with a technical knockout.
See the result of the other main battles:
Darren Hill (18-2-1) beat Kelvin Gastelum (15-5) in points (27-30, 29-28, 30-27), middleweight;
Stephen Thompson (15-4-1) beat Vicente Luke (17-7-1) in scoring (30-26, 30-26, 29-27), middleweight;
Derrick Lewis (22-7) beat Blagoy Ivanov (18-3) in points (30-27, 28-29, 29-28), heavyweight;
Kevin Lee (18-5) defeated Gregor Gillespie (13-1) in the first round, lightweight.







For more on football and sports news, subscribe to @ river_sport!
